Paragraph: Such energy level lowering was attributed to the integration of carboxylate and vinylene groups giving rise to a push - pull structural motif , resulting in an enhanced PCE of the PV devices based on them.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| carboxylate groups |
| vinylene groups |

The two "Material Name" entities identified in the paragraph are "carboxylate groups" and "vinylene groups". These entities are mentioned as components that contribute to the energy level lowering and enhanced performance of certain photovoltaic (PV) devices.
